ruling: - If you control [[Harpies' Hunting Ground]] on your side of the field, because it is a Field Spell Card, its effects apply to both players. When either player Normal Summons or Special Summons a [[Harpie Lady]] or [[Harpie Lady Sisters]] to the field, the controller of that newly-Summoned monster is the one who selects 1 Spell or Trap Card and destroys it.
- You can chain to the effect of [[Harpies' Hunting Ground]] that destroys 1 Spell or Trap Card.
- The effect of [[Harpies' Hunting Ground]] that increases ATK and DEF is applied to all face-up Winged Beast-Type monsters on the field, including your opponent's, because it is a Field Spell Card.
